subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Gary Nova was 25 of 35 passing for a career-best 397 yards and 5 touchdowns to lead visiting Rutgers to a 35-26 win over Arkansas on Saturday night.
snippet: Gary Nova was 25 of 35 passing for a career-best 397 yards and 5 touchdowns to lead visiting Rutgers to a 35-26 win over Arkansas on Saturday night.
